comment.author: 34427465504@N01
comment._content: While trying to figure out what year this photo was taken, I found this blog post: pauldorpat.com/?page_id=1346. The top photo in the post shows a frozen lake with two buildings in the background that match two buildings in the background of your flickr photo. I've made notes on the flickr photo so that you can see what I mean. The blog post claims the photo is of Green Lake and was taken in 1916. You might want to take a look at the post to see whether the information they have corroborates with the information you have.
